Assignment.title: Assignment
Assignment.description: Represents a homework assignment or academic task.

title.description: The title or name of the assignment.

dueDate.description: The date and time the assignment is due.

completed.description: Indicates whether the assignment has been completed.

suggestedStartDate.description: The suggested date to start the assignment.

estimatedWorkload.description: Estimated hours to complete the assignment.

createdAt.description: The date and time the assignment was created.

/users/{userId}/assignments/{assignmentI.description: Stores assignment entities owned by a user.
